ARABIC: نُمَتِّعُهُمْ قَلِيلًا ثُمَّ نَضْطَرُّهُمْ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We will let them enjoy themselves a little, then drive them to a harsh punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We let them enjoy themselves only for a while, then We shall drag them to a severe punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We allow them to enjoy themselves a while in the world and then We shall drive them in utter helplessness to a harsh chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We shall allow them to enjoy themselves for a short while, then force them into severe torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We shall give them some usage, then making them helpless take them towards a severe punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We let them enjoy for a little while, then in the end We shall oblige them to (enter) a great torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We give them to enjoy a little, then will We drive them to a severe chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: To them We give enjoyment a little, then We compel them to a harsh chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We give them comfort for a little, and then We drive them to a heavy doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We shall let them enjoy themselves for a little while, but then We shall drive them to a harsh punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: We let them enjoy for a while, and then We shall drive them to a torment rough.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We will provide for them for a short time, then We will shove them toward a harsh punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We grant them their pleasure for a little while: in the end shall We drive them to a chastisement unrelenting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We let them enjoy for a little while, then in the end We shall oblige them to (enter) a great torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We give to them a little enjoyment for awhile, and then will compel them to a tremendous punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We give them a little comfort; then We compel them to a harsh torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: We grant them enjoyment for a little; then We will force them to a massive punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [31:24] We will give them comfort, in this world, for a little [while], for the [duration of the] days of their lives, then We will drive them, in the Hereafter, to a harsh chastisement, namely, the chastisement of the Fire from which they will find no escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We give them comfort for a little) in the life of this world, (and then We drive them to a heavy doom) to a severe torment, one kind of torment after another.
